title: Lineto
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Lineto**

Typefoundry in Zürich, [Switzerland](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Switzerland).

Their name comes from the old [PostScript](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/PostScript) command, "lineto"… as such, the correct pronunciation of their name is not "lin-e-to" but "line-to".

[http://www.lineto.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224801/http:/www.lineto.com/ "http://www.lineto.com/")
author: rabattski
